name: Foreseeson Technology Inc.
address: Foreseeson Technology Inc., 4460 Jacombs Rd #101, Richmond, BC V6V 2C5

featured_reviews.review_id:
We've had the best experience with Foreseeson Technology as my distributor for Fortinet equipment, support contracts and licenses. They are fast and will make your life easier when you are in a rush to receive and deploy a project. They will also provide advices and even when you make mistakes, they will help you resolve them and to not lose money and/or time.

Normally our experience with other distributors is not really smooth and client oriented, but your mind will change and you will be amaze by the support and help from the Foreseeson team.

featured_reviews.review_id: We have relied on Foreseeson since 2007 and highly recommend the company as a vendor for our IT Solutions.  Maria and the team have proven to be consistently reliable, reactive, and have been able to help us get out of quite a few jams due to their flexible nature and quick responses.  We value our partnership highly and look forward to continuing to work with them in the coming years!"

featured_reviews.review_id:
Foreseeson has excellent customer service!
Always quick to respond, I am able to ask for quotes and have them returned within the hour. They are patient in the sale process and will work with you to get the correct deal done.

They have become my primary source of Fortinet everything.

Foreseeson also has a dedicated communication channel to Fortinet and will get a fast response for any technical questions you have regarding which has made sales and implementation so much more efficient and with less hassle! :)

featured_reviews.review_id: Working with Foreseeson since our introduction last year has been an absolute pleasure.  Their care and attention to detail has been refreshing by comparison to some of the larger players out there.  Highly responsive to any urgent requests that come up and also willing to go the extra mile when addressing any complications we have with vendors and support contracts.  They've also been great at keeping us up to date on any new developments and products from our favourite vendors.  After being involved with the distribution giants and getting lost in the constant games of pass-the-buck, if I can get it from Foreseeson, I always will.

featured_reviews.review_id: I engaged Foreseeson Technology to install a ChargePoint charger in my condo parking spot. It took them and Charge Point 7 months to bring the system online. I paid almost $5,000 and invested over 30 hours of my time to try and trouble shoot issues with both Foreseeson and Chargepoint. The list of errors created by this installer and Chargepoint included: 1. faulty hardware equipment on two occasions; 2. over two months of failed software trouble shooting; 3. one occasion of incorrect electrical settings by Chargepoint; 4. over 15 occurrences of Charepoint staff that could not help address charging issues. Although the final result is a working charger, the road to this point was a circus of errors and tail chasing. If you are looking to install, I would encourage you away from Foreseeson Technology and Chargepoint. I have had a very negative experience and would not recommend either company. Best wishes in your search.

featured_reviews.review_id: I'd like to take this opportunity to write a nice review for ForeSeeson Technology Inc. Our IT company has been working with ForeSeeson for a number of years now and all of our Fortinet purchases and renewals go through this company. They offer competitive pricing, and our rep Austin is beyond amazing. He is very responsive, offers good information on how to navigate renewals or end of life appliances, and makes sure that things get done when we send in requests. We can't be happier with our experience of ForeSeeson and would recommend using them to anyone who asks. Thanks for all the help ForeSeeson and of course Austin :o)

featured_reviews.review_id:
Austin and Foreseeson Technology are awesome to deal with! Their customer service is top notch!
They are much quicker and more efficient than the big distributors.

I would highly recommend working with Austin for any of your needs!

featured_reviews.review_id: Quick turnaround for quotes, aggressive pricing and first class customer service. These are the things you can expect when dealing with Foreseeson for your Fortinet needs. Special mention to Austin Lee who goes the extra mile every single time.
